body.name: Enfamil Gentlease Baby Formula, Reduces Fussiness, Crying, Gas and Spit-up in 24 hours, DHA & Choline to support Brain development, Powder Can, 19.9 Oz, Pack of 4 (Total 79.6 Oz)
features: ALL IN ONE COMFORT: Enfamil Gentlease is scientifically formulated to help ease fussiness, crying, gas and spit-up in 24 hours
EXPERT RECOMMENDED DHA: Enfamil Gentlease has expert recommended brain building DHA
COMPLETE NURTITION: Contains important nutrients found in breast milk to help support cognitive brain development through their first 12 months
NON-GMO: No added table sugar (sucrose), corn, artificial growth hormones, antibiotics or GMOs
#1 TRUSTED BRAND: Enfamil is the #1 Trusted Brand for Brain-building & Immune Support
PEDIATRICIAN RECOMMENDED: Enfamil is the #1 infant formula brand recommended by pediatricians
body.description: Enfamil Gentlease Infant Formula provides a gentle start for sensitive tummies. It's designed to have easy to digest proteins and is clinically proven to ease fussiness, gas, colic and crying in 24 hours. Enfamil is backed by decades of research on breast milk and multiple clinical studies on its brain building power. It is tailored to meet the nutritional needs of all infant through 12 months, and has an easy to digest blend inspired by breast milk.t's unique Triple Health Guard blend has 30 nutrients for growth, omega 3 DHA and Choline to help maximize learning potential and an exclusive probiotics blend for immune support. *QuintilesIMS, using the ProVoice Survey fielded from Janurary 2017 to December 31, 2017. **Not made with genetically modified ingredients, but trace amounts of genetically engineered materials may be present in the product from manufacturing environments and process sources. Ingredients: Corn syrup solids, partially hydrolyzed nonfat milk and whey protein concentrate solids (soy), vegetable oil (palm olein, soy, coconut and high oleic sunflower oils) and less than 2%: Mortierella alpinaoil*, Crypthecodinium cohnii oil†, vitamin A palmitate, vitamin D3, vitamin E acetate, vitamin K1, thiamin hydrochloride, riboflavin, vitamin B6 hydrochloride, vitamin B12, niacinamide, folic acid, calcium pantothenate, biotin, ascorbic acid, choline chloride, inositol, calcium carbonate, calcium phosphate, magnesium phosphate, ferrous sulfate, zinc sulfate, manganese sulfate, cupric sulfate, sodium selenite, sodium citrate, potassium chloride, potassium iodide, taurine, L-carnitine. * A source of arachidonic acid (ARA). † A source of docosahexaenoic acid (DHA).

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Comparison Table Gentlease Powder Can See Details Gentlease Powder Can See Details Gentlease Powder Can See Details Enfamil Infant Powder Can Add to Cart Customer Reviews 4.7 out of 5 stars 717 — — 4.8 out of 5 stars 1,870 Price — — — $29.86$29.86 Size 19.9 oz 12.4 oz 27.7 oz 21.1 oz Form Powder Powder Powder Powder Product Benefit Great value for everyday use Great value for everyday use 35% more formula Complete Nutrition Halal ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Omega-3 ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔

Does this product have DHA? Yes, Enfamil Gentlease has DHA & Choline which are two important nutrients to help support cognitive brain development. What is the difference between Infant and infant Gentlease? Enfamil Gentlease is designed to help ease gas, fussiness, spit-up & crying. Does Enfamil Gentlease support baby’s immune system? Yes, Enfamil Gentlease has vitamins and minerals to help support your baby’s immune system. Can I give Enfamil Gentlease to my newborn? Yes, Enfamil Gentlease Formula is tailored to meet the complete nutritional needs of your infant & help support their early milestones through 12 months of age. Is this product gluten free? Yes, all of Enfamil’s products are gluten free.
* All claims associated with "#1 Brand" or "#1 Pediatrician recommended brand" are supported by the 2021 Provoice IQVIA Survey

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good price plus arrived before expected date.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is the only brand of formula that my twin grandbabies were able to use without it, making them spit up.

reviews.reviewText: Loved this since she goes through it so fast and dont have to worrie if the stores were out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: happy with my purchase! nothing damaged

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2019
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using enfamil gentlease for a while now so I’m familiar with the product. The review is for the seller. Overall great product and great price. I usually spend a little over a hundred for 4. Retail 25.12 @ Walmart for 1 can. So you can do the math. Currently selling for ~$82.00 on Amazon. Will continue to shop if prices and product quality remain the same. Also the product expires in two years!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Product was just as described and was sealed.
reviews.reviewText: Product was just as described and sealed properly, did not look as if anyone tried to tamper with it. GREAT QUALITY.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Great value for the money, saving a few dollars with a new baby is hard. But this was absolutely worth it. With Covid I shop sparingly, so this was just a weight off our minds
